      • updateBox

        void updateBox(java.lang.String list,
               java.lang.String tag,
               org.xml.sax.Attributes atts)
        Updates a Box dictionary with tagged attributes.

        Attributes are added to the last entry in the list of dictionaries. One of the attributes must be "id" which is used as the id for the entry. Attributes "tag" and "target" are concatenated to the id as tag/id:target.

        Parameters:
        list - the list the box is in
        tag - the entry tag
        atts - the attributes to add
